post:
FiberVolt is now offering VPS in Chicago on our new nodes at Chicago DC.

For a limited time, we are offering a the following plan to the first 50 orders.

256MB RAM
512MB Burst
30GB HDD
300GB B/W *DOUBLED
$58/YEAR

*1 Gigabit network.

For more details on the specials and the ordering page, please visit http://fibervolt.com/special.php
For more details on our new data center, please visit http://fibervolt.com/network.php

If you have any other concerns, please feel free to email me at vteoh [at] fibervolt.com
